data.name: access_error
data.value: Unable to create a new file or overwrite the current one. Please don't mess with the program's directories IN THE MIDDLE of an important operation! You'll have to redownload the versionlists again if you want to save them.

data.name: access_error_debug
data.value: Write unsuccessful. Keeping versionlists in memory until next reload.

data.name: cant_del_folder
data.value: Couldn't remove folder after deletion. Ensure there is no other data in

data.name: close_code_debug
data.value: Detected that NUSGrabber.exe has closed with exit code of

data.name: connect_error
data.value: Could not connect to the internet. Make sure you have internet access before loading titles!

data.name: connect_error_debug
data.value: Couldn't connect to the internet. Not loading titles.

data.name: convert_error
data.value: There was a problem converting the selected item. Note your selected item, contact FoxMcloud5655 on GBATemp, and tell him to look into this problem!

data.name: convert_error_debug
data.value: Error converting title name into a ListItem.

data.name: copy_ckey_error
data.value: Unable to copy common key. Ensure you have access to read and write to the directory that you specified and that your common key actually exists.

data.name: copy_files_error
data.value: Unable to copy files. Ensure you have access to read and write to the directory that you specified and that CDecrypt.exe is in the root directory of the directory that this program is stored in.

data.name: copy_saved_ckey_error
data.value: Unable to copy saved common key. Ensure you have access to read and write to the directory that you specified.

data.name: copy_saved_ckey_error_debug
data.value: Couldn't copy saved common key to

data.name: debug_log_error
data.value: Unable to write debug log. Make sure you don't have it open somewhere and that you have write access to the root directory that this program is stored in.

data.name: debug_start_emu
data.value: started in emulated debug mode on

data.name: deleting_debug
data.value: Deleting previously downloaded files by user request.

data.name: dl_update3
data.value: You are already up to date.

data.name: dont_rename
data.value: Don't rename the .exe! Please change it back to NEW-NUSGrabberGUI.exe!

data.name: error_cdecrypt
data.value: There was an unknown problem while decrypting.

data.name: error_check_update
data.value: There was an error checking for the newest version.

data.name: error_dir
data.value: Unable to set working directory. Ensure you have access to read and write to the directory that you specified.

data.name: error_dir_debug
data.value: Couldn't set working directory to target directory.

data.name: error_dll_cdecrypt
data.value: Error detected: MSVRC120.dll not found. Please install Visual C++ x86.

data.name: error_dl_update
data.value: Failed to download the update. You can still manually update from here:\nhttps://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41125193/NUSGrabber/NEW-NUSGrabberGUI.exe\nThe program will now exit.

data.name: error_internet_update
data.value: Unable to connect to the internet to check for updates.

data.name: error_internet_update_debug
data.value: Couldn't connect to the internet to check for updates.

data.name: error_no_titles_debug
data.value: No titles in titlelist. Disabling UI and showing reload button.

data.name: error_rename_update
data.value: Failed to rename the exe back. Program will now exit, and you'll need to rename it yourself.

data.name: error_rename_update_debug
data.value: Failed to rename self back to normal.

data.name: error_restart_update
data.value: Failed to restart program. You'll need to exit and delete the old version, then load the program again.

data.name: error_start_cdecrypt
data.value: There was a problem starting CDecrypt. Ensure you have permission to execute files in the directory that you specified.

data.name: error_start_nus
data.value: There was a problem starting NUSgrabber. Ensure that you have NUSgrabber in the root directory that this program is stored in.

data.name: error_update
data.value: Failed to rename old exe. You'll need to manually update from here:\nhttps://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41125193/NUSGrabber/NEW-NUSGrabberGUI.exe

data.name: extract_error
data.value: Couldn't extract/read base files. Make sure this program has read/write access to the directory it's stored in.

data.name: no_vs
data.value: Detected that NUSGrabber didn't run. Install Visual Studio C++ (x86) and try again.

data.name: no_vs_debug
data.value: Detected that NUSGrabber didn't run. Installation of Visual Studio C++ x86 (32-bit) is required.\nStatus Code: STATUS_INVALID_IMAGE_FORMAT

data.name: incomplete2
data.value: " and try downloading the title again.

data.name: incomplete_dl_debug
data.value: Incomplete download detected. Deleting previous files.

data.name: load_vl_error
data.value: Unknown error while loading the version list!

data.name: load_vl_error_debug
data.value: Unknown error ocurred while trying to load wiiu_versionlist.txt. Skipping load.

data.name: load_vl_loaded
data.value: Titlelist already in memory. Skipping load.

data.name: load_vl_modified
data.value: The versionlist file was modified externally. Either fix it or redownload it.

data.name: load_vl_modified_debug
data.value: wiiu_versionlist.txt was modified externally. Skipping load.

data.name: not_implemented
data.value: Feature not implemented yet. Select a game update or full title instead.

data.name: no_del_ckey_debug
data.value: Common key was already part of

data.name: no_dll
data.value: Unable to locate a .dll file. Perhaps you are running WINE?

data.name: no_dll_debug
data.value: Detected that NUSGrabber didn't run. Unable to find a required .dll.\nStatus Code: STATUS_DLL_NOT_FOUND

data.name: no_key
data.value: Title successfully downloaded, but no decryption key was found. Can't decrypt automatically.

data.name: no_key_debug
data.value: Couldn't find "title.tik". Skipping auto-decryption.\nTitle downloaded successfully.

data.name: no_region
data.value: Please set your region in the settings before selecting this option!

data.name: no_tik
data.value: Unable to find "title.tik". Did you download a full title? Ensure you have this file in the directory that you specified.

data.name: no_tmd
data.value: Unable to find "title.tmd". Ensure this is truly a WiiU title.

data.name: parse_complete_debug
data.value: Parse complete. Writing data to wiiu_versionlist.txt.

data.name: parse_error
data.value: Unable to parse data. Either you aren't connected to the internet, or Nintendo has changed their format.

data.name: path_debug
data.value: Assumed path to the downloaded files is

data.name: redownload_title
data.value: You have already downloaded this title. Are you sure you wish to redownload it?

data.name: rename_debug
data.value: Attempting to rename original file - try #

data.name: start_alt_dl_debug
data.value: Starting background download using libWiiSharp with

data.name: start_alt_dl_error
data.value: An error has occured while trying to run the embeded NUSGrabber.

data.name: title_not_found
data.value: Title not found on Nintendo's servers.

data.name: unknown_error
data.value: There was an unknown problem while downloading.

data.name: update_success
data.value: Successfully obtained update. Application will now restart.

data.name: update_vl
data.value: Are you sure you want to update the VersionList for all titles in

data.name: user_close
data.value: NUSGrabber exited without finishing the download. Please do not exit NUSGrabber while it's downloading!

data.name: user_close_debug
data.value: User closed NUSGrabber. Program exited without finishing download.

data.name: write_error
data.value: Unable to create a new file or overwrite the current one. Ensure that you have permission to write to the root directory that this GUI is stored in.

data.name: write_error_debug
data.value: Unable to open/create wiiu_versionlist.txt. Skipping update.

data.name: ckey_del
data.value: ckey.bin is already in the folder set for decryption. Would you like to delete it? If not, the file will be used instead.
